𓃱

𓋴𓂋𓃱

1) زُرنَا zurnā, “flute, zurna” and پَا pā, “leg” obsolete:
2) 𓈎𓄿𓅱𓀠 qairna 𓃀 ⇔ پَا pā, “leg” high-legs
